title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Namur, Belgium
content:
Photo submitted by Eric Hourant, “This picture has been taken in Namur, Belgium. This place called Seven Meuse is a well known take off place for paragliders. It overhangs the beautiful Meuse valley. My freshly repainted Santa-Cruz Tallboy-2 and I followed a wood track to go down.” We always love seeing photos from where you

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Namur, Belgium appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
